name: ticky
description: Ticky is a self-hosted issue and ticket tracker that enables teams to record, categorize, and resolve tasks. It features status boards, comments, and a simple web interface suitable for small teams or personal projects.
features: Issue tracking: Create and manage issues with titles, descriptions, and detailed information for problem resolution.
Status boards: Organize issues on boards with customizable status columns for workflow visualization.
Categorization: Group issues by project, type, or custom categories for better organization.
Comments: Discuss issues with team members using threaded comments for context and collaboration.
Assignment: Assign issues to team members to clarify responsibility and track workload distribution.
Priority levels: Set priority levels for issues to focus on critical problems first.
Simple interface: Navigate and manage issues through a straightforward web interface without complexity.
Search and filter: Find issues quickly using search and filter by status, assignee, or category.
Activity tracking: Monitor recent changes and updates to stay informed of issue resolution progress.
Small team focus: Designed for small teams or personal projects without enterprise overhead.
Attachment support: Add files and screenshots to issues for better documentation and context.
Resolution tracking: Mark issues as resolved and maintain history for reference and reporting.
